events.message: The insured has filed a claim reporting a rear-end collision with significant vehicle damage occurring on 2024-04-30.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a car collision resulting in damages.
An agent with experience in auto insurance claims has been assigned to manage the case promptly.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer expressing understanding of the situation and next steps.
Customer has been requested to submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a copy of the accident report.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including a detailed accident report and photographs showing rear-end damage.
Investigation team has commenced a thorough review of submitted evidence and third-party liability for the collision.
Investigation concluded that the insured was not at fault and the extent of damages has been verified.
A fair settlement offer covering repair costs and rental car reimbursement was proposed to the insured.
Customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the timely communication and proposed settlement.
Approval was granted for the claim payment after final review and confirmation of all claim details.
Payment for the approved claim amount was processed and transferred to the insuredâ€™s account successfully.
The claim file was officially closed following completion of settlement and receipt of customer confirmation.
Final documentation and correspondence were archived in the company system for future reference.
